## Visualizations

Making density plots of the parameters, based on benign or malignant

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)



# set seed
set.seed(1234)

 
# Customize density plot
ggplot(data = cancer_dataset, 
       mapping = aes(x = `radius mean`, fill = as.factor(diagnosis))) +
  
  geom_density(alpha = 0.8, 
               color = "black", 
               size = 0.5) +
  
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("0" = "lightpink", "1" = "lightblue")) +
  labs(x = "Parameter", y = "Value", title = "Density Plot by Category") +
  theme_minimal()
  
```
